flawed_nl_solution:
In five years, Phoebe will be 10+5 = <<10+5=19>>19 years old.
If Raven is four times as old as Phoebe in fifteen years, he will be 4*19 = <<4*19=76>>76 years old in 5 years.
Currently, Raven is 76-5 = <<76-5=71>>71 years old.
#### 71

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 19. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
